headline.print_headline: F.D.A. Warns of Side Effects for 2 Stop-Smoking Drugs
headline.seo: F.D.A. Warnings on Stop-Smoking Drugs Chantix and Zyban

byline.original: By GARDINER HARRIS and DUFF WILSON

docs.lead_paragraph: Federal drug regulators warned that patients should be watched closely for signs of serious mental illness.
